keys: The Council of the European Union
El consejo de la unión europea

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Il Consiglio dell'Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="en">The Council of the European Union</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Rat des europäischen Anschlußes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Conseil de l'union européenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conselho da união européia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Συμβούλιο της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El consejo de la unión europea</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un esercizio di completamento sul Consiglio dell'Unione Europea ( il suo ruolo, membri, riunioni, ecc.)</string>
            <string language="en">This is a gap-fill exercise about the Council of the European Union (its roles, members, meetings, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Il Consiglio dell'Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="en">The Council of the European Union</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">cittadinanza europea</string>
            <string language="en">European citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Abstand-füllen Übung über den Rat 
des europäischen Anschlußes (seine Rollen, Bauteile, Sitzungen, 
usw..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est intervalle-remplissent exercice au sujet du
Conseil de l'union européenne (ses rôles, membres, réunions, 
etc...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é abertura-enche o exercício sobre o 
conselho da união européia (seus papéis, membros, reuniões, etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια άσκηση χάσμα-αφθονίας για το 
Συμβούλιο της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης (οι ρόλοι, τα μέλη, οι 
συνεδριάσεις του, κ.λπ....)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es boquete-llena ejercicio sobre el consejo 
de la unión europea (sus papeles, miembros, reuniones, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Rat des europäischen Anschlußes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Staatsbürgerschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Conseil de l'union européenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citoyenneté européenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conselho da união européia</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">El consejo de la unión europea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudadanía europea</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivo:-gli alunni dimostreranno la loro conoscenza del Consiglio dell'Unione Europea ( istituzione decisionale) Metodo didattico: lettura attiva ( leggere e svolgere un esercizio interattivo) e feedback rapido. Strumento di presentazione dei contenuti: pagina web( testo, grafica, e link) sul Consiglio dell'Unione Europea. Strumento di valutazione: esercizio di completamento a feed back rapido</string>
            <string language="en">Objective: - pupils will demonstrate knowledge of the Council of the European Union(a decision-making institution)
Teaching method: active learning (reading + doing an interactive exercise) and rapid feedback 
Content presentation tool: web page (text, graphics and hyperlinks) about the Council of the European Union 
Assessment tool: gap-fill exercise with rapid feedback</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
